title: Susan Lindauer
content:
Lindauer Is a journalist and anti-war activist. She’s a former US intelligence asset. <!--more--> She was targeted for wanting vital truths exposed.

She was indicted on secret fake evidence.
She was threatened with indefinite detention.
She spend a year in prison.

She was denied a trial or hearing.
Days before Obama’s inauguration, all charges were dropped.

Her book titled “Extreme Prejudice: The Terrifying Story of the Patriot Act and the Cover Ups of 9/11 and Iraq” explains her experience.

Major world and national issues will be discussed.
